title: Chinese boy, 6, is covered in glass after a supermarket door shatters while he pushes it open
text:
A glass door shattered over a boy after he pushed it to open at a mall in southern China.

CCTV footage captured in the city of Changsha on September 30 shows the glass door shattering over the six-year-old boy after he violently pushing it open.

The boy falls to the ground and can be seen getting back onto his feet while his grandmother checks on him.

The boy can be seen pushing open a door in the supermarket in Changsha, China

The door shatters after the boy pushed it past its limit showering him in shards of glass

The boy had injuries to his head and arms and was sent to hospital.

According to reports, the boy's mother is negotiating a compensation package with the mall's owners but is yet to reach an agreement.
description: CCTV footage captured in the city of Changsha on September 30 shows the glass door shattering over the six-year-old boy after he violently pushing it open.
